scripts.dev:pages: sh -c 'mkdir -p .wrangler-logs && WRANGLER_LOG_PATH=./.wrangler-logs npx wrangler pages dev dist --port 3005 --env-file .dev.vars --compatibility-date 2026-01-27'
scripts.dev:pages:proxy: sh -c 'mkdir -p .wrangler-logs && WRANGLER_LOG_PATH=./.wrangler-logs npx wrangler pages dev --proxy 3005 --port 3006 --env-file .dev.vars --compatibility-date 2026-01-27'
